T02D3547:183b-1: ka na ka warna pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3547:183b-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma gser mdog can gyi sgrub thabs /
T02D3547:183b-4: 'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3547:183b-5: rang gi snying gar aom yig las byung ba'i zla
T02D3547:183b-6: ba'i dkyil 'khor la dh'i:yig rnam par bkod pa las
T02D3547:183b-8: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang /
T02D3547:183b-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams bskul zhing gang na drangs
T02D3547:183b-10: nas mdun du stan sna tshogs pa la bzhugs par
T02D3547:183b-11: bltas nas / yid kyis phyag dang /
T02D3547:183b-14: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D3547:183b-15: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D3547:183b-16: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D3547:183b-17: bsod rnams yongs su bsngo ba dang /
T02D3547:183b-18: bzod par gsol ba rnams byas te /
T02D3547:183b-23: de nas aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva
T02D3547:183b-24: bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod nas stong pa
T02D3547:183b-26: de nas de bzhin du skad cig gis zla ba la gnas pa'i dh'i:yig bltas la /
T02D3547:183b-27: de yongs su gyur pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ral pa'i cod pan can /
T02D3547:183b-28: zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa /
T02D3547:183b-29: phyag gnyis chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya mdzad pa /
T02D3547:183b-30: rin po che sna tshogs pas brgyan pa /
T02D3547:183b-32: phyag g-yon pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D3547:183b-33: pa dang ldan pa'i autpa la sngon po bsnams pa
T02D3547:183b-34: / na bza' sna tshogs pa'i stod g-yog can /
T02D3547:183b-35: phyag g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa /
T02D3547:183b-36: padma dmar po dang zla ba la rdo rje skyil
T02D3547:183b-37: krung gis bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma rnam par
T02D3547:183b-38: bsgoms te / de nas brtan pa'i nga rgyal bya'o //
T02D3547:183b-39: gang bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol
T02D3547:183b-40: tu phyin ma'i nga rgyal dang bcas pa'i nga rgyal
T02D3547:183b-41: can gang yin pa de bcom ldan 'das ma shes
T02D3547:183b-42: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'o //
T02D3547:183b-43: de nas sngags dgod par bya ste /
T02D3547:183b-44: mgrin par aom dh'i:lce la aom ghi:rna ba dag la
T02D3547:183b-45: dzi:de nas rang gi snying gar a'a:yig dmar po las
T02D3547:184a-1: 'dab ma brgyad pa ze'u 'bru ge sar dang bcas pa bsams la yi ge rnams dgod par bya'o //
T02D3547:184a-2: yid kyis padma'i 'dab ma dang ze'u 'bru ser po rnams la shar gyi 'dab ma la na mo /
T02D3547:184a-3: me'i 'dab ma la bha ga wa tyee /
T02D3547:184a-4: lho'i 'dab ma la pradzny'a pa ra mi t'a yee /
T02D3547:184a-5: bden bral du aa mi ta gu n'a ye /
T02D3547:184a-6: chu bdag gi 'dab ma la bha ga wa ti batstsha l'a ye /
T02D3547:184a-7: rlung gi 'dab ma la sarba ta th'a ga t'a dzny'a na pa ri p'u r'a ye /
T02D3547:184a-8: lus ngan gyi 'dab ma la sva tva batstsha l'a ye /
T02D3547:184a-9: dbang ldan gyi 'dab ma la tadya th'a aom dh'i:karni k'a yam /
T02D3547:184a-18: de bzhin du sngags kyi yi ge rnams bkod nas bzlas so //
T02D3547:184a-19: yi ge 'di rnams de bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
T02D3547:184a-20: thun mtshams gsum du stong phrag brgyad ji srid zla
T02D3547:184a-21: ba drug gi bar ram yang na los de thos
